alert.note: Alert for Colquitt; Tift; Turner; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 24 at 4:30PM EDT until May 24 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Turner County in south central Georgia... Northeastern Colquitt County in south central Georgia... Tift County in south central Georgia... Southeastern Worth County in south central Georgia... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 430 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Omega, or 7 miles southwest of Tifton, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sylvester, Tifton, Omega, Norman Park, Poulan, Ty Ty, Phillipsburg, Unionville, Terrell, Sumner, Hillsdale, Eldorado, Chula, Scooterville, Inaha, Tift Airport, Coverdale, Fender, Crosland and Shingler. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
